tours.title: Tokyo Highlights & Hidden Gems
tours.description: Discover the best of Tokyo in this comprehensive tour that takes you through both famous landmarks and local secrets.
highlights: Experience local street food at Tsukiji Outer Market

itinerary.title: Morning: Traditional Tokyo
itinerary.description: Start at Senso-ji Temple and explore Asakusa area

itinerary.title: Afternoon: Modern Tokyo
itinerary.description: Visit Shibuya and experience contemporary culture

tours.title: Kyoto Cultural Experience
tours.description: Immerse yourself in Japanese culture with this authentic Kyoto tour featuring temples, tea ceremonies, and traditional gardens.

itinerary.title: Morning: Temple Tour
itinerary.description: Visit the famous Golden Pavilion and nearby temples

itinerary.title: Afternoon: Cultural Activities
itinerary.description: Participate in tea ceremony and visit bamboo grove

tours.title: Osaka Food & Culture Tour
tours.description: Experience the best of Osaka's famous food scene and vibrant culture in this exciting day tour.
highlights: Sample local street food in Dotonbori

itinerary.title: Morning: Historical Osaka
itinerary.description: Visit Osaka Castle and surrounding park

itinerary.title: Afternoon: Food Adventure
itinerary.description: Explore markets and try local specialties
